posts.post_title: WTB or trade for:  blank back T206 HOFer
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy or trade for a blank back T206 HOFer, preferably in an SGC holder.

Thanks
I have several  but they are not in SGC holders.

I am interested in the any that might still be available (should the first poster decide to pass).

Regards,
